extendedInfo.description: GPS Locate & Share Free uses the power of the global positioning technology with the convenience of your smart phone to share your location instantly.When you're somewhere you don't have the address, just open this app, press the âLocate Meâ button, it will pinpoint your position on a zoomable satellite map, and displays the street address as well as the GPS coordinates, then you can Share your location by SMS or e-mail, or copy the location into Clipboard and use it within other apps.  Overall, this app has the following features:-  Locate your current location with Latitude and Longitude, along with the postal address if data connection is available.-  Instantly share your location via SMS or email.-  Copy the location information to Clipboard so you can use it within other apps.-  Show your location in the Google Map App.-  Launch the Android Navigation program to navigate to the last location.This is an Ad-Supported application.  This app uses the following permissions:-  GPS: To locate your location.-  Internet: To get postal addresses, and show the address in the map.Notes: - If you are using a 3rd party SMS or email programs and the address does not populate into your program automatically, then please use the Clipboard Paste function to paste the address into your program.- Sometimes the GPS may take a long time to communicate with the satellite, especially, when you are in indoors. If âLocate Meâ doesn't return your location or return the last known location, then please increase the âLocate Me Timeoutâ setting and try again.

reviews.title: Very good
reviews.comment: Simple, intuitive and where easy to use. Love the intregration w Navigation app upon SMS receipt. Only thing I\'d add is integrating w contact list.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Caused me to lose every single text message when I sent my location via text messaging!  I am furious!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: LG Optimus quad-core, JB
reviews.comment: Here I sit on Vancouver Island & I\'m pinpointed in Winnipeg... PoS
reviews.author: beN in NaNaiMo

reviews.title: Gps Locate and share free
reviews.comment: Very very good app. Donot hesitate, just download this very good utility.
reviews.author: Themton Irani
